summary.span: 完成這個動態模組的全域函式定義和全域資料定義。

span.span: Completes the global function definitions and global data definitions for this dynamic module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者是使用定義在這個動態模組中的所有全域函式時，應該呼叫這個方法。This method should be called when the user is done with defining all the global functions within this dynamic module. 之後呼叫此函式，不允許任何的較新的全域函式或新的全域資料。After calling this function, no more new global functions or new global data are allowed. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個成員已不再需要使用旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用`CreateGlobalFunctions`建立的全域的靜態方法，從實作。The following sample illustrates the use of `CreateGlobalFunctions` to create a static global method from a implemented with . [!code-cpp[ModuleBuilder_CreateGlobalFunctions#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_CreateGlobalFunctions/CPP/modulebuilder_createglobalfunctions.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ModuleBuilder_CreateGlobalFunctions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_CreateGlobalFunctions/CS/modulebuilder_createglobalfunctions.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ModuleBuilder_CreateGlobalFunctions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_CreateGlobalFunctions/VB/modulebuilder_createglobalfunctions.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義的列舉是在衍生的類別的。The defined enum is a derived class of . `value__`欄位都和屬性集。The `value__` field has and attributes set. 如需可以指定為基礎的列舉類型的內建整數類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[類別庫概觀](~/docs/standard/class-library-overview.md)。For more information about the built-in integer types that can be specified as the underlying types of enumerations, see [Class Library Overview](~/docs/standard/class-library-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，就必須定義使用的列舉型別因為列舉型別，其項目屬於型別就會發出而不是列舉類型。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is necessary to define enumerations using because emits enumerations whose elements are of type instead of the enumeration type. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，發出的列舉其項目具有正確的類型。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, emits enumerations whose elements have the correct type. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個成員已不再需要使用旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將`DefineEnum`實作的動態模組中的列舉型別類別。The following example illustrates the use of `DefineEnum` to implement an enumeration class in a dynamic module. 此範例會定義名為列舉型別`Elevation`具有基礎類型，並建立兩個項目： `Low`，值為 0，及`High`，值為 1。The example defines an enumeration named `Elevation` that has an underlying type of , and creates two elements: `Low`, with a value of 0, and `High`, with a value of 1. 已建立的類型之後，組件會儲存名稱`TempAssembly.dll`。After the type has been created, the assembly is saved with the name `TempAssembly.dll`. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)來檢查此組件的內容。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the contents of this assembly. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 此程式碼範例不會產生正確的列舉型別。Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, this code example does not produce a correct enumeration. [!code-cpp[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/CPP/modulebuilder_defineenum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/CS/modulebuilder_defineenum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/VB/modulebuilder_defineenum.vb#1)]

summary.span: 定義二進位大型物件 (BLOB)，表示要嵌入動態組件的資訊清單資源。

span.span: Defines a binary large object (BLOB) that represents a manifest resource to be embedded in the dynamic assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會記錄在組件資訊清單中的資源可以是受管理的資源或資訊清單資源的 Blob，而且每一種可以包含組件中連結或內嵌。Resources that are recorded in the assembly manifest can be managed resources or manifest resource BLOBs, and each of these can be included in the assembly either by linking or by embedding. 這四個案例都支援動態組件。All four scenarios are supported for dynamic assemblies. - 這個方法可讓您將內嵌至動態組件資訊清單資源 BLOB。This method allows you to embed a manifest resource BLOB into a dynamic assembly. - 若要插入資訊清單模組的動態組件或附屬模組，請內嵌 managed 的資源，請使用方法來取得資源寫入器，並使用方法來新增資源。To embed a managed resource into the manifest module of a dynamic assembly or into a satellite module, use the method to get a resource writer, and use the method to add the resource. - 若要連結至動態組件的受管理的資源，請使用方法來取得資源寫入器，並使用方法來新增連結的資源。To link a managed resource into a dynamic assembly, use the method to get a resource writer, and use the method to add the linked resource. - 若要連結至動態組件資訊清單資源 BLOB，請使用方法來新增連結的資源。To link a manifest resource BLOB into a dynamic assembly, use the method to add the linked resource. 此外，單一的 Win32 資源可以附加至組件利用方法或方法。In addition, a single Win32 resource can be attached to an assembly by using the method or the method. 此資源沒有出現在組件資訊清單。This resource does not appear in the assembly manifest. ## Examples 下列範例會產生並儲存名為動態組件`EmittedManifestResourceAssembly.exe`，其中包含內嵌的 unmanaged 資源。The following example generates and saves a dynamic assembly named `EmittedManifestResourceAssembly.exe`, which contains an embedded unmanaged resource. 此範例會建立組件可包含一個模組，然後開啟記憶體資料流包含 unmanaged 的資源。The example creates the assembly, which consists of one module, and opens a memory stream to contain the unmanaged resource. 程式碼會接著呼叫方法來定義資源。The code then calls the method to define the resource. > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用任何一種資料流，為您的資源;比方說，您也可以從檔案讀取的未受管理的二進位資料。You can use any kind of stream for your resource; for example, you can read the unmanaged binary data from a file. 此範例中的動態模組中定義的類型`Main`方法，並產生方法主體的 MSIL。The example defines a type in the dynamic module with a `Main` method, and generates MSIL for the method body. 之後的主體`Main`方法已經產生，而且已經建立型別，程式碼範例會將五個位元組寫入至資訊清單資源相關聯的資料流。After the body for the `Main` method has been generated and the type has been created, the code example writes five bytes to the stream associated with the manifest resource. 儲存組件時，資源會附加至它。When the assembly is saved, the resource is appended to it. 在之後執行此範例中，您可以執行發出的組件。After running the example, you can run the emitted assembly. 發出的組件中的程式碼`Main`方法會讀取內嵌的資訊清單資源，並會列印到主控台的位元組值。The code in the emitted assembly's `Main` method reads the embedded manifest resource and prints the byte values to the console. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)來檢視組件資訊清單中的資訊。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to view the information in the assembly manifest. [!code-csharp[DefineManifestResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineManifestResource/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DefineManifestResource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineManifestResource/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 DLL 匯入屬性 （請參閱 System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute 的描述） 不能指定為此方法的引數。Some DLL import attributes (see the description of System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute) cannot be specified as arguments to this method. 這類屬性應該設定所發出之方法的自訂屬性。Such attributes should be set by emitting a custom attribute for the method. 例如，DLL 匯入屬性`PreserveSig`設定所發出的自訂屬性。For example, the DLL import attribute `PreserveSig` is set by emitting a custom attribute. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個成員已不再需要使用旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將`DefinePInvokeMethod`方法用來建立是外部的 unmanaged 方法，請`MessageBoxA`，Win32 API 中。The following example illustrates the use of the `DefinePInvokeMethod` method to create a for an external unmanaged method, `MessageBoxA`, in the Win32 API. 此範例會顯示在訊息方塊**重試**並**取消**按鈕，並顯示訊息方塊的傳回值。The example displays a message box with **Retry** and **Cancel** buttons, and displays the return value from the message box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要取得非零傳回值，您必須新增方法實作旗標建立之後，利用和方法。To get a non-zero return value, you must add to the method implementation flags after you create the , by using the and methods. [!code-cpp[ModuleBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod1/CPP/modulebuilder_definepinvokemethod1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ModuleBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod1/CS/modulebuilder_definepinvokemethod1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ModuleBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod1/VB/modulebuilder_definepinvokemethod1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectionTypeLoadException` 是特殊類別載入例外狀況。`ReflectionTypeLoadException` is a special class load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`屬性包含的模組中定義並且載入的類別之陣列。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of classes that were defined in the module and loaded. 這個陣列可以包含部分 null 值。This array can contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`屬性為陣列，代表類別載入器擲回的例外狀況的例外狀況。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. 類別陣列漏洞產品有例外狀況。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 例如，如果其中一個類別的類別初始設定式擲回例外狀況，它載入時，`TargetInvocationException`中的對應項目會儲存`LoaderExceptions`陣列。For example, if the class initializers of one of the classes throws an exception while it is being loaded, a `TargetInvocationException` is stored in the corresponding element of the `LoaderExceptions` array. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個成員已不再需要使用旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權杖用於 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令，以識別物件。Tokens are used in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instructions to identify objects. 權杖是相對於其所包含的模組。Tokens are relative to the module in which they are contained. 例如，權杖值供`String`很可能是不同的模組對模組。For example, the token value for `String` is likely to be different from module to module. 當`GetTypeToken`是叫用，參考新增至模組。When `GetTypeToken` is invoked, a reference is added to the module. 參考會變成永久的模組;使用相同的引數的多個呼叫有任何額外的作用。The reference becomes a permanent part of the module; multiple calls with the same argument have no additional effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用型別上的方法所在`metadataToken`位於範圍內，以取得泛型類型引數的陣列`genericTypeArguments`。Use the method on the type where `metadataToken` is in scope to obtain an array of generic type arguments for `genericTypeArguments`. 使用方法上的方法所在`metadataToken`位於範圍內，以取得泛型類型引數的陣列`genericTypeArguments`。Use the method on the method where `metadataToken` is in scope to obtain an array of generic type arguments for `genericTypeArguments`. 您總是安全地提供這些引數，即使不需要它們。It is always safe to provide these arguments, even when they are not needed. > [!NOTE] > 中繼資料語彙基元的相關資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，尤其是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意 >。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 線上; 會提供文件請參閱[ECMA C# 和 Common Language Infrastructure 標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上並[標準 ECMA-335-通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 網站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. 如示範語彙基元解析程式碼使用一般的內容 （也就是泛型型別和 （或） 權杖會內嵌的泛型方法的泛型型別參數） 請參閱方法。For code that demonstrates token resolution using the generic context (that is, the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded) see the method.
